caption: Very cuuuuute bar located inside the St. Roche Market at the prestigious Miami Design District.  They have a nice menu with many different cocktails, drinks, wines, and more!  I ordered a glass of Malbec and it was ok.  The service was fine and I liked how clean everything was and how much effort the guys were putting to maintaining the place neat.
This bar serves a huge selection of signature cocktails,wine and more...nice staff very attentive,good price ,great location,nice atmosphere...clean and confort

The fish on my ceviche was way old mixed with fresher fish. Also, expensive for the portion. Only two people on the bar for a full house. Poor guys ! After spending over one hundred dollars, I had to go eat somewhere else. Not planing to go back.
